title: The Battle of Jutland
itunes:title: The Battle of Jutland
description: On this episode of Battles & Banter, Avery is joined by Justin Voithofer and Patrick McGuire of "The History Things Podcast" to hit the high seas for the first naval battle of this show. Avery, Pat & Justin talk the Battle of Jutland, fought between the British Grand Fleet and the German High Seas Fleet in the North Sea, just off the coast of the Jutland Peninsula of Denmark. The guys discuss the plans of both sides, as well as the effect that heavy dreadnoughts had on not just World War I, but naval warfare going forward as well. So man your battle stations and **INSERT NAVAL JARGON HERE** for one heck of an episode! Enjoy!
